description: Number of "connected animals" formed from n tricapped truncated tetrahedra in the diamond lattice, allowing translation and rotations of the lattice and reflections.
references: A. T. Balaban and Paul von R. Schleyer, "Graph theoretical enumeration of polymantanes", Tetrahedron, (1978), vol. 34, pp. 3599-3609. See Page 3605.
links: S. T. Coffin, Puzzling World of Polyhedral Dissections, Oxford Univ. Press, 1991.
author: Achim Flammenkamp (achim(AT)uni-bielefeld.de)
